Topic: Nutrition 245: Natural Remedies for the Pain Patient Credit Hours: 2 Instructor: Howard Benedikt, DC, DCBCN Course Description: We all see patients that have acute pain and unfortunately we see all too often the chronic pain sufferer. In this seminar we will dive into the natural and nutritional management of pain so that we can bring greater relief to the patients we treat. Chiropractic & nutritional management are a perfect combination! Course Outline: Learning Objectives: Before you start the online presentation, please read this important information: Follow the links in the course video description to view the PDF notes, handouts, and resources for this presentation.
